lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson has won two majors since Tiger Woods claimed his last one, and Mickelson now has surpassed Rory McIlroy for No. 2 in the world rankings.
snippet: Phil Mickelson has won two majors since Tiger Woods claimed his last one, and Mickelson now has surpassed Rory McIlroy for No. 2 in the world rankings.
